title: Create a Piping and Instrumentation Diagram (P&ID)
description: A process engineer needs to create a new P&ID for a simple chemical dosing system.

tasks.description: Open the CAD software and start a new P&ID drawing using the company's standard template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully opens the correct template.

tasks.description: Add the required equipment symbols to the diagram (e.g., tank, pump, valves).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent places the correct symbols from the standard library onto the drawing.

tasks.description: Draw the pipelines connecting the equipment and add instrument bubbles (e.g., for pressure and level transmitters), then submit for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the diagram according to standard P&ID conventions and submits it.
